div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 223366009 (Healthcare professional)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 307988006 (Medical technician)

publisher.value: National Resource Center for EHR Standards

description.value: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
